snippet.title: Happy Bastards - Official Trailer | Future Games Show 2024
snippet.description:
Check out Happy Bastards, a game all about letting your minions do the dirty work of fighting for you.

Happy Bastards is coming soon.

#Gaming #Games #GameTrailers
